result.title: Codeforces Round #FF (Div. 2)
result.content:
Codeforces Round #FF (Div. 2) It was really a nice round. Thanks to the problem setter jcvb and jiry_2, for holding such a round with high quality and giving me a FST message before final test(while pending system test).

I truly did not thought about the special circumstances about changing the value of the first of the array, so I failed the test #27.

E was really a nice problem, but I hadn't finished writing my strange segment tree....
